ScriptItemPortable.SourceCode:
def InitializeRow(entity, row):
if (row.DeleteCommand != None): row.DeleteCommand.Visible = False
if (entity.Fields["STATUS"].Value != 1) and (row.EditCommand != None): row.EditCommand.Visible = False
if entity.Fields["STATUS"].Value == 1 and entity.Fields["LIBERADA"]: row.GetCellByName("STATUS").Text = "Confirmar"
